response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly benefit your needs. It's designed to enhance efficiency and streamline processes, potentially saving you time and resources. Given its high quality and functionality, I'm confident it would be a valuable addition to your operations. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $75. This is an exceptional deal considering its market value and the benefits it offers. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 75}
